messages.zh: 第五关（后）
messages.en: level 5(post)
Yikes——!

messages.zh: 快找掩体！
messages.en: Take cover!

messages.zh: 我没事，只是擦伤而已，不要紧......
messages.en: I’m okay, it’s just a scratch, it’s alright……

messages.zh: 刚才帮助我们的......是谁？
messages.en: Who was it……that just helped us?

messages.zh: 路过的感染者......吗？
messages.en: An Infected passing by……huh?

messages.zh: 不管是谁，都成功帮我们争取到了时间！
messages.en: No matter who that was, she bought enough time for us!

messages.zh: 还不够......再这样下去，包围圈会不断紧缩。
messages.en: No enough yet……if this keeps up, the encirclement will keep contracting.

messages.zh: {@nickname}博士已经发现了突破口，但没有增援，我们只能采取守势，无法突围......！
messages.en: Dr.___ has found a breach already, but without reinforcement, we can only stay in defense, there’s no way to break through……!

messages.zh: ......再坚持一下！优先火力压制对方射手！我们来处理先锋！
messages.en: ……Hang on just a bit longer! Suppress their shooters first! We’ll deal with the vanguards!

messages.zh: 没错，没错！再多挣扎一点！再让我多看一看你们挣扎的样子！
messages.en: That’s right, that’s right! Struggle harder! Let me take in more of your struggles!
Urghh——

messages.zh: 然后就去死吧，像雨夜中的火星一样！
messages.en: Then die, like sparks in a raining night!

messages.zh: 还没完——还没完——！
messages.en: It’s not over——it’s not over yet——!
But……

messages.zh: 偶数干员退列休息！后备干员各自填补位置！不要让整合运动打开哪怕一丁点缺口！
messages.en: Even number operators step back! Backup operators fill in! Don’t let Reunion Movement open a single gap!

messages.zh: 如果必要的话——
messages.en: If necessary——

messages.zh: 什么？什——不唔唔唔唔唔啊啊啊！！！
messages.en: What? Wh——uuarghhhh！

messages.zh: 唔唔？撞飞起来了？发生什么了——
messages.en: Huh huh? Knocked into the air? What just happened——
What……is this……

messages.zh: 你们比我预期的慢上太多。我可是连平民都顺手安顿好了。
messages.en: You’re so much slower than I expected. I even arranged for the civilians on the way.

messages.zh: 迅速打开通路，别给敌人重整阵形的机会！
messages.en: Open a passway at once, don’t give the enemies any chance to reform!

messages.zh: 临光小姐！！
messages.en: Miss Nearl!!

messages.zh: 我在。阿米娅你没事就好。
messages.en: I’m here. Amiya, good to see you’re okay.

messages.zh: 幸亏这次作战有你参加。
messages.en: Thank goodness we have you in this operation.

messages.zh: 信号定位很有效。看来你们遇到的麻烦确实不小。
messages.en: The positioning signal is quite effective. Looks like you did run into a lot of trouble.

messages.zh: 您就是{@nickname}博士吧？
messages.en: You’re Dr.___ right?

messages.zh: 耀骑士临光，前来迎接你们了。
messages.en: Illumiknight Nearl, at your service.
